sect1.title: General
sect1.para: The module implements the linke between the AUTOSAR CAN TP package and Routing Engine. The module is also required in order to be able to have dynamic channels.

There the files are split in 2 categories:
static code.
generated code using xml/xsl

In order to generate the code first it is required to export the Tresos configuration using the following steps. Please export the RtU configuration into the RtU.arcfg file using (AR 4.2.2) format. This step is also mentioned when tool runs. Make sure that the file is stored into the variant specific folder. Step 1.
Step 2.
Step 3.
Once the configuration is exported, the integrator just needs to run the build.bat without any parameters from the CanIf_GwAdapter/(1/evo)/tools folder.
